title: Arithmetic HEO-based Hash
statement_md: Define **ArithHash** by building a prime-weighted cumulative sequence from message bytes, measuring a grid of HEO-like counts for \(d \in \{2,3,5\}\) and small offsets \(k\), XOR-folding 32-bit scalars \(\lfloor 2^{32} H_{d,k} \rfloor\), then applying SHA-256.
